title: Parasitic worms cause cancer -- and could help cure it

title_detail.value: Parasitic worms cause cancer -- and could help cure it

summary: Billions worldwide are infected with tropical worms. Unsurprisingly, most of these people live in poor countries, kept poor by the effects of worm-related malnourishment. What may surprise many is that worms also cause the majority of cases of some cancers in these countries.
